content: designed for the 2024 games this pattern is based on **french weave** a fun easy-to-work stitch perfect for working while watching the action every time the games are on i make some patterns especially for the games - you can find more info about other patterns - here 1 written for dk weight yarn but you can adjust to use other weights if you like allow approx 100m/110yds each of 2 yarns for a single loop allow approx 200m/220yds each of 2 yarns for a double loop for the contrast colour you can use variegated or striping yarn for interesting effects for the main colour you can use light or dark yarn solid or even another variegated or striping yarn just make sure you have good contrast between all the colours in the yarns the cowl is worked as a strip starting with a provisional cast-on and then kitchenered/grafted together for a seamless finish 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/stitchnerds/4321577/1-25#1
